pages.text: The $(thing)Magmatic Dynamo$() generates electricity from hot liquids such as $(item)Lava$(). Its maximum output is 40-120 RF/t depending on the tier. One bucket of $(item)Lava$() generates 120 000 RF and one bucket of $(item)Blazing Pyrotheum$() generates 2 000 000 RF.
Raw materials required: 2 $(item)Nickel Ingots$(), 6 $(item)Iron Ingots$(), 3 $(item)Redstone$() and a $(item)Silver Ingot$().

The speed at which energy is generated and fuel is consumed depends on how much power can be emitted, and on the dynamo's maximum power output. A basic steam dynamo has a maximum power output of 40 RF/t. This can be increased by upgrading the dynamo to a higher tier, and by installing certain augments.

When an active steam dynamo cannot emit the energy it generates, it will keep working at its minimum power output (a tenth of its maximum power output). Any more energy that is generated in this case is lost. This can be resolved by installing an $(item)Excitation Field Limiter$().

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(thing)Magmatic dynamos$() come in six tiers. These have the following power output limits and augment slots:$(li)Basic: 40 RF/t, no augments$(li)Hardened: 60 RF/t, 1 slot$(li)Reinforced: 80 RF/t, 2 slots$(li)Signalum: 100 RF/t, 3 slots$(li)Resonant: 120 RF/t, 4 slots

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: The following augments can be installed in a $(thing)Steam Dynamo$() to improve it:$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/auxiliary_transmission_coil)Auxiliary Transmission Coil$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/fuel_catalyzer)Fuel Catalyzer$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/transmission_coil_ducting)Transmission Coil Ducting$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/excitation_field_limiter)Excitation Field Limiter$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/boiler_conversion)Boiler Conversion$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/isentropic_reservoir)Isentropic Reservoir$()$(p)Note that the number of augments is limited by the dynamo's tier, with the basic tier having no augment slots.
